Privacy_policy_SubTitle: Privacy policy about in this app
More_information_text1: If you want to encrypt or decrypt an image, IED is the right application for you. It is easy to you and fun to work with. Your encrypted or decrypted image will be secure because we use a very complicated methods and logarithms to process the encryption ordecryption. Doing so, makes it impossible for anyone who doesn’t have the key for encryption and decryption to view the image.
More_information_text2: This application has been made to meet the requirements for high security process of encryption and decryption to help people who want to send sensitive information without any leaking of any part of this information. No one without having the keycan view the content of the image even the developers of the application. We tried to make as simple as possible to help you doing your task without complications of usage.
More_information_text3: This app has been made by © 2023 IED | KSU_Group_2 for final graduation project. Our goal is to continue developing this application to improve it by adding more features' to it that could help people to protect their information from being stolen.
More_information_text4: Copyright © 2023 : Dr. Abdullah Alharbi - KSU_Group_2 . All rights reserved
Privacy_policy_text1: Our privacy policy will help you understand what information we collect at app IED, how IED uses it, and what choices you have. built the IED app as a free app.'This SERVICE is provided by IED at no cost and is intended for use as is.
Privacy_policy_text2: This app (IED) does not use & does not share any user information' and any information used in this application, we cannot access it.
Privacy_policy_text3: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes.''We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.''These changes are effective immediately, after they are posted on this page.
